amendment.description: To require a specific authorization of Congress for the commencement of the engineering development phase or subsequent phase of a Robust Nuclear Earth Penetrator.

vote.text: Amendment SA 766 agreed to in Senate by Voice.

action.text: Amendment SA 766 proposed by Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S6805; text: CR S6805) To require a specific authorization of Congress for the commencement of the engineering development phase or subsequent phase of a Robust Nuclear Earth Penetrator.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 766 agreed to in Senate by Voice.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 766 proposed by Senator Nelson FL.
